Hager Elkasapy
hagerelkasapy@gmail.com                     +201550422006
Mansoura, Egypt                                                        GitHub                                                                         LinkedIn
Profile
I’m a UI/UX Designer and Front-End Developer with a background in Computer Science, currently pursuing my degree. I specialize in creating clean, user-friendly interfaces for mobile apps and websites, with a strong focus on usability, accessibility, and responsive design. My foundation in C++ and programming logic gives me a solid understanding of how things work under the hood, helping me design and build experiences that are not only visually appealing but also technically sound. I enjoy bridging the gap between design and development, and I’m always looking to grow my skills and create meaningful digital products.

•	Programming Background
o	Solid foundation in C++ with experience in problem-solving.

	Quran Kareem Web App
 Developed a simple Quran reader using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring surah navigation and audio playback.
	Simple Calculator App
 Built a basic calculator using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with support for standard arithmetic operations and a clean UI.
	Plant App UI Design
Designed a clean and modern plant shopping app in Figma, focusing on intuitive navigation and visual hierarchy for an engaging user experience.
	Travel App UI Design
Designed a mobile travel booking app in Figma with a clean layout and user-friendly.
